root.name: Mahjong Cub3d
root.description: OverviewMahjong Cub3d is a puzzle game developed by Sunsoft. The game has different game modes that are all centered around traditional Mahjong Solitaire, including a new mode called 3D Mahjong where you must rotate a cube that has Mahjong tiles on it. The game has over 200 puzzles to solve and a multiplayer mode for two people.
